snippet.title: Castlevania Requiem: Symphony of the Night & Rondo of Blood Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Castlevania Requiem: Symphony of the Night and Rondo of Blood is now available exclusively on PlayStation®Store. 

PSN: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0101-CUSA13434_00-CASTLEVANIA00001. 

Play this timeless saga of the whip-cracking, vampire hunting Belmont Clan that comes with several new updates, including 4K/1080p upscaling, multiple high resolution backgrounds, different rendering options, Trophies, as well as other enhanced elements. 

Fans can also be excited to learn that both English and Japanese voice options are now available for the first time in Castlevania: Symphony of the Night

Also, make sure you check out the critically acclaimed Castlevania series on Netflix! 
Visit: http://www.netflix.com/castlevania.
